title: Space ballet: a story of Apollo 9
creator_credit: United States Information Agency and United States. National Aeronautics Space Administration
brief_description: The flight of Apollo 9 to splashdown on March 13, 1969, showing the flight of the Lunar Module, the first in space history. Emphasis is placed on the human aspects of the flight. Music is from the feature film, “Yellow Submarine”. Narrated by Pernell Roberts.
creator_credit_for_label: United States Information Agency and United States. National Aeronautics Space Administration
